epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security features
epics.description: Develop a multi-factor authentication system to ensure secure logins. Implement encryption protocols to protect sensitive financial data. Enable features for password recovery and account lockout after multiple failed attempts.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.description: Design and build a personalized dashboard that displays available banking products and services based on user profile and eligibility. Ensure the dashboard provides an intuitive and user-friendly interface for easy navigation.

epics.title: Account Requests and Modifications
epics.summary: Implement functionality for account opening requests and modifications
epics.description: Develop workflows to allow customers to submit account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. Ensure the process is streamlined and user-friendly.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates
epics.description: Implement a system to provide real-time status updates and email notifications regarding submitted requests. Ensure the updates are timely and accurate.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions
epics.description: Develop a feature to maintain a comprehensive history of all user interactions. Ensure the data is secure and easily accessible for the user.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive across various devices
epics.description: Develop a responsive design for the portal to provide a consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Ensure compatibility with different screen sizes and resolutions.

epics.title: Save Incomplete Applications
epics.summary: Allow users to save and return to incomplete applications
epics.description: Implement functionality to allow users to save incomplete applications and return to them at a later time. Enable users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface.

epics.title: Core Banking Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration with the bank's existing core banking system. Maintain a separate database for the portal to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access controls to ensure users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level.
